name: Dungeon of ROTT (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

Welcome to the Dungeon of ROTT, Watch out for Monsters, Keep an Eye out for Traps and Tresure, Push Scroll Up 8 Way Fire,

1 Player Game.

Made with the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software.

2 Downloads for this Game:

ROTTGirlC64 is the Game with a Female Player Sprite, See Screenshots.

ROTTPenguinC64 is the Game with my attempt at a Penguin Player Sprite, See Screenshots.

The Game is the same for both Downloads just different Player Sprite
